name: Alakazam
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokemon to another as long as you don't Knock Out that Pokemon. This power can't be used if Alakazam is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Blastoise
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may attach 1 Water Energy card to 1 of your Water Pokemon. (This doesn't use up your 1 Energy card attachment for the turn.) This power can't be used if Blastoise is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Blastoise but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

name: Chansey
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Chansey during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)
Attack2Text: Chansey does 80 damage to itself.

name: Charizard
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may turn all Energy attached to Charizard into Fire Energy for the rest of the turn. This power can't be used if Charizard is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Discard 2 Energy cards attached to Charizard in order to use this attack.

name: Clefable
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. Metronome copies that attack except for its Energy costs and anything else required in order to use that attack, such as discarding Energy cards. (No matter what type the Defending Pokemon is, Clefable's type is still Colorless.)
Attack2Text: All damage done by attacks to Clefable during your opponent's next turn is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Clefairy
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. Metronome copies that attack except for its Energy costs and anything else required in order to use that attack, such as discarding Energy cards. (No matter what type the Defending Pokemon is, Clefairy's type is still Colorless.)

name: Gyarados
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Magneton
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage to each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Magneton does 80 damage to itself.

name: Mewtwo
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 1 Psychic Energy card attached to Mewtwo in order to use this attack. During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Mewtwo.

name: Nidoking
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage and Nidoking does 10 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. It now takes 20 Poison damage instead of 10 after each player's turn (even if it was already Poisoned).

name: Nidoqueen
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each Nidoking you have in play.

name: Ninetales
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and switch it with the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Ninetales in order to use this attack.

name: Pidgeot
Attack2Text: Unless this attack Knocks Out the Defending Pokemon, return the Defending Pokemon and all cards attached to it to your opponent's hand.

name: Poliwrath
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Poliwrath but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Energy cards attached to it, choose 1 of them and discard it.

name: Raichu
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Raichu.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Raichu does 30 damage to itself.

name: Scyther
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Scyther's Slash attack's base damage is 60 instead of 30.

name: Venusaur
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may take 1 Grass Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokemon and attach it to a different one. This power can't be used if Venusaur is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

name: Wigglytuff
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Zapdos
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Zapdos does 30 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: Discard all Energy cards attached to Zapdos in order to use this attack.

name: Beedrill
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Dragonair
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Energy cards attached to it, choose 1 of them and discard it.

name: Dugtrio
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each of your own Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Electabuzz
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage and Electabuzz does 10 damage to itself.

name: Electrode
AbilityText: At any time during your turn (before your attack), you may Knock Out Electrode and attach it to 1 of your other Pokemon. If you do, choose a type of Energy. Electrode is now an Energy card of that type (instead of a Pokemon) that provides 2 energy. This power can't be used if Electrode is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Electrode does 10 damage to itself.

name: Kangaskhan
Attack1Text: Draw a card.
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Mr. Mime
AbilityText: Whenever an attack (including your own) does 30 or more damage to Mr. Mime (after applying Weakness and Resistance), prevent that damage. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.) This power stops working while Mr. Mime is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Pidgeotto
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokemon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If Pidgeotto was attacked last turn, do the final result of that attack on Pidgeotto to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Pinsir
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Snorlax
AbilityText: Snorlax can't become Asleep, Confused, Paralyzed, or Poisoned. This power can't be used if Snorlax is already Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Venomoth
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may change the type of Venomoth to the type of any other Pokemon in play other than Colorless. This power can't be used if Venomoth is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused and Poisoned.

name: Victreebel
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and switch it with his or her Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your next turn.

name: Arcanine
Attack1Text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Arcanine in order to use this attack.
Attack2Text: Arcanine does 30 damage to itself.

name: Butterfree
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokemon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Remove a number of damage counters from Butterfree equal to half the damage done to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance) (rounded up to the nearest 10). If Butterfree has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.

name: Charmeleon
Attack2Text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Charmeleon in order to use this attack.

name: Dewgong
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Dodrio
AbilityText: As long as Dodrio is Benched, pay Colorless less to retreat your Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Dodrio.

name: Exeggutor
Attack1Text: Switch Exeggutor with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy attached to Exeggutor. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Farfetch'd
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. Either way, you can't use this attack again as long as Farfetch'd stays in play (even putting Farfetch'd on the Bench won't let you use it again).

name: Fearow
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Fearow.

name: Kakuna
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Kakuna during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Machoke
Attack1Text: Does 50 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Machoke.
Attack2Text: Machoke does 20 damage to itself.

name: Magikarp
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Magikarp.

Attack2Text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Magmar in order to use this attack.

Attack2Text: Search your deck for a Fighting Basic Pokemon card and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. (You can't use this attack if your Bench is full.)

name: Nidorina
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Persian
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon attacks Persian during your next turn, any damage done by the attack is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance). (Benching either Pokemon ends this effect.)

name: Poliwhirl
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Raticate
Attack2Text: Does damage to the Defending Pokemon equal to half the Defending Pokemon's remaining HP (rounded up to the nearest 10).
